description: Represents an installed app for a business.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the business app install record.

business_uid.description: Unique identifier of the business that has the app installed.

app_code_name.description: The unique code name of the installed app (e.g., "calendar_sync").

created_at.description: The date and time when the install record was created, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the install record was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.
